658050.name: The Dragons' Twilight
658050.description:
The world is in dire need of a hero…

Such a shame it’ll have to settle for less.

Follow Alvar, Landric, and Valerie as they
successfully fail their way to restoring a
fallen dragon to her former self in hopes
of stopping another dragon-god from
obliterating mankind.

* Read the Dev's Dragons' Twilight novel (Free at Smashwords)

Features:

  • No Random Encounters
  • Dungeon Puzzles
  • 100+ Abilities to Find and Master
  • Minimal Level Grinding Required
  • Easily Swap Ability Sets by Changing Equipment.
  • In-game Tutorial for RPG Newbies
